item.title: Notes on Finance
item.description: General Principles Net Present Value (NPV) Interest Rates Internal Rate of Return (IRR) Tax (Opportunity) Cost of Capital Time Travel for Money Arbitrage Law of One Price Cash Flow Stream Perpetuity Annuity Decision Rules NPV Rule IRR Rule Payback Rule Bond Bond Price Zero-Coupon Bond Coupon Bond Stock Dividend-Discount Model Total Payout Model Discounted FCF (Free Cash Flow) Model textbook: Corporate Finance
